item.title: Content Negotiation using Spring MVC
item.dc:creator: Paul Chapman
item.description: There are two ways to generate output using Spring MVC: You can use the RESTful @ResponseBody approach and HTTP message converters, typically to return data-formats like JSON or XML. Programmatic clients, mobile apps and AJAX enabled browsers are the usual clients. Alternatively you may use view resolution. Although views are perfectly capable of generating JSON Read more...

item.title: Spring Data Arora SR1 released
item.dc:creator: Oliver Gierke
item.description: I am pleased to announce the first service release for the Spring Data Arora release. It includes the following modules: Spring Data Commons 1.5.1 – Changelog Spring Data JPA 1.3.1 – Changelog Spring Data MongoDB 1.2.1 – Changelog Spring Data Neo4j 2.2.1 – Changelog Spring Data Redis 1.0.4 – Changelog Spring Data Gemfire 1.3.1 – Read more...

item.title: Introducing Spring XD
item.dc:creator: Mark Fisher
item.description: Today we are officially kicking off a new initiative called Spring XD whose theme is "tackling Big Data complexity"1. The Spring Data team has been incredibly busy over the past few years, not only providing support for NoSQL datastores but also simplifying the development experience with Hadoop. With the creation of the Spring for Apache Read more...

item.title: Spring and Open Source at the Pivotal Initiative
item.dc:creator: Adrian Colyer

item.title: Bringing new life to Spring Travel with Thymeleaf
item.dc:creator: Daniel Fernï¿½ndez
item.description: Hi reader! My name is Daniel Fernández and I am the author of the Thymeleaf template engine as well as several other open source technologies. I recently helped update the Spring Travel sample application and migrate its view layer to Thymeleaf, and the nice folks at SpringSource have given me the opportunity to write Read more...

item.title: Spring Petclinic is on Github!
item.dc:creator: Michael Isvy
item.description: We are pleased to announce that the Spring Petclinic sample application has been refactored. The source code is now available on github and has been deployed on cloudfoundry. Here is a screenshot of the new application: And here is an overview of the new architecture: Spring, Spring, Spring We have used the following Spring features: Read more...

item.title: Spring Data GemFire 1.3.0 Released
item.dc:creator: David Turanski
item.description: I am pleased to announce the GA release of Spring Data GemFire 1.3.0. In addition to many minor bug fixes and enhancements, this release includes some notable new features to make writing Java applications with GemFire even easier: Annotation Support For Functions GemFire provides the ability to "bring the code to the data" by providing Read more...

item.title: Performance Improvements in STS 3.2.0
item.dc:creator: Martin Lippert
item.description: The latest release of the Spring Tool Suite (3.2.0) contains a large number of performance improvements in many different areas. We are not only adopting the latest improvements from the Eclipse Juno SR2 maintenance release (which fixes a large number of performance issues with the new Eclipse 4 platform UI), we also worked on the Read more...

item.title: Scripted 0.4 released
item.dc:creator: aclement
item.description: This week we've released version 0.4 of our JavaScript focused code editor. You can read about the background of Scripted here. The full release notes for 0.4 are here but in this article I'll call out a few of the more interesting changes. Tooltips Scripted uses an inferencing engine to build an understanding of your Read more...

item.title: Spring at China Scale: Alibaba Group (Alipay, TaoBao, and TMall)
item.dc:creator: Josh Long
item.description: So What Does It Take to Operate at China Scale? The challenges inherent to building enterprise applications that meet China-scale demand are unparalleled. One exemplary Chinese organization using Spring heavily to solve very unique challenges is the Alibaba group. Alibaba is itself an online auction site, like eBay in the west. The Alibaba group in Read more...
